Comment: Al and I have had a running argument over the French for about 20 years now. Against 1. e4 he plays other defenses so seldom they're not even worth mentioning, and his knowledge of the various lines of the French is almost encyclopedic. In other words, when we have this little argument he's usually the one who wins.
